about_the_game:
NightSong is an "Action-RPG" made by one person. It is about a young pilgrim named Tycho.

Tycho lives in a little stage theatre under the ground. It isn't her home. She would like to go to her own home to sleep in her own bed.

However, the omnipresent soul-influence of Inversion-Distortion has started the End Of The World. Inversion-Distortion uses the direct powers of Machines of War and Torture to degrade the Soul of Man, and also uses more subtle Spiritual Warfare in the form of Images, Words, Voices and Visions.

With Inversion-Distortion's overwhelming presence beating down on her, Tycho must find her way to the Capitol of Lights, her former home.

Gameplay:

NightSong is a top-down game played with the keyboard. You can use the arrow keys to attack enemies with your screwdrivers, and can press shift to dodge.
If you press the Q button you will be stronger for a little while.
Sometimes there are people to talk to, or objects that flash 'images', and things like that. You can press E to interact with them.

Please enjoy the demo when it becomes available. The demo save file will be compatible with the final version when it is complete.

content_descriptors.notes: NightSong contains depictions of abuse, violence, gore, mature language, suicide, and death.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700HQ CPU @ 2.80GHz (8 CPUs), ~2.8GHz
  • Memory: 16384 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Additional Notes: These are the system specifications that the game was developed with. It may be able to run on weaker hardware but I do not know.
